import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Create inventory action"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/inventory/actions"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Creates a new inventory action record.

**Note**: This API is marked as deprecated (v1.0).

**Prerequisites**:
- **InventoryId**: Use [POST /api/v1.0/inventory/inventories](/docs/api/inventory/query-inventories) to find stock entries
- **InventoryActionTypeId**: Use reference data endpoints to get valid action type IDs

**Workflow**:
1. Search for the inventory stock entry to get `InventoryId`
2. Determine the action type (consumption, addition, transfer, etc.)
3. Submit the action with quantity delta and optional entity reference

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"description":"Inventory action to create.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request body for creating or updating an inventory action. Contains all fields from the InventoryAction model.","properties":{"InventoryActionId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier of the action (required for updates, generated on create)."},"GroupKey":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Optional key for grouping related actions together."},"InventoryActionTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Identifier describing the type of action."},"InventoryId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Identifier of the stock entry to affect."},"RelatedEntityTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Identifier describing the related entity type."},"RelatedEntityId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Identifier of the related entity (e.g., ticket)."},"ActionDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"When the action occurred."},"Quantity":{"type":"integer","description":"Quantity delta to apply (negative for consumption, positive for addition)."},"UnitCost":{"type":"number","format":"double","description":"Unit cost recorded for the transaction."},"Description":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Optional description or notes about the action."}},"title":"UpdateInventoryActionRequest"},"example":{"InventoryActionTypeId":"d3ea78e4-707a-ec11-ba97-88665a256e9d","InventoryId":"dd0380ff-6d1a-ed11-a1f9-000d3a7e102a","RelatedEntityTypeId":"888891ac-91aa-e711-80c2-100dffa00001","RelatedEntityId":"60155607-d8a9-f011-8e61-000d3a7bb518","ActionDate":"2024-11-03T13:56:22.777Z","Quantity":-1,"UnitCost":35.55,"Description":"Part used for ticket repair"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
